title: New: Ouisa Hound – Copse Clad At Clague
content:
You may remember that I included Ohio’s Ouisa Hound in my Sound of 2012 list, for his gorgeously enticing two debut tracks. Well, earlier today Ouisa Hound shared a new piece via Soundcloud, in the form of the fifteen minute drone-inspired Copse Clad At Clague. Shifting gears slickly between hip-hop and ambient soundscapes, this is ambitious even by his standards, yet it works fantastically. The sheer level of immersion felt whilst listening to Copse Clad… is unparalleled, and will hopefully go someway to rightfully cementing his name as a producer to really keep an eye out for.

Ouisa Hound’s debut record The Joy Eclectic is set to be released within the next couple of weeks.

Copse Clad at Clague by Ouisa Hound
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
